website_summaries.verdict: This 7-piece countersink drill bit set offers amazing versatility and won't break your budget.
pros: Carbon steel construction delivers long-lasting strength and durability
3-point design ensures accurate drill positioning in wood, plastics and composites
Can be used effectively in pillar, power and hand drills
cons: Some faults with hex screws not staying tight

customer_reviews.title: Hot Scammy Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Utter junk. Nice fake German name. Naming your company something German doesn't make your tools less garbage, just makes you into a scammer. Really sick of living in the age of deception.
customer_reviews.author: MiniMoose

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage
customer_reviews.text: The design on these is very poor, utilizing a set screw to keep the countersink part in place. The problem is that the torque generated by the countersink encountering even soft pine will overcome the friction of the set screw trying to hold it in place (this is a bigger problem on the smaller bits ... like the ones you would probably want to use for wood screws). If you try to gorilla tighten the set screw to keep the countersink from spinning, you strip the allen head. Should've spent more money and gotten something with a better design.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Countersink Drill Bit Set
customer_reviews.text: I just received the item. I tried it out quickly because I had a project that the paint was drying and I didn't want to create any dust. I couldn't answer the longevity or durability question. However; I was happy to hear that you are sending me a screw extractor as a FREE GIFT. I could really use that. BTW. in your e-mail you stated: we know how scare time can be. However the correct spelling of your message should have been SCARCE. Perhaps you can fix that before you send out too many more. In college I had the greatest English teacher of all. Looking forward to the extractor. Thanks for being a great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Basiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Tried out one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit because I like the idea of countersinking screws. The countersink cutting bit appears to be one sized, that is, all cut the same size hole. I tried out the smallest one and it worked well. One of the countersink cutting piece came off of one in the box and I had to reposition and fasten. It seems that the bigger the drill bit the deeper the hole will be drilled since the countersink cutting bit sits at the top of the drill bit. I suspect that if you have a short screw you might have to use the shortest countersink drill bit to get the countersink part without drilling a deep hole.
customer_reviews.author: Discriminating Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Good countersinks are wonderful. These guys, not so much. Maybe you've noticed -- wood screws are tapered. Good countersinks have tapered drill bits so the threads bite all the way to the tip. These don't. They have straight twist bits so the bottom of the holes are drilled too wide for the threads, If you want to go to the effort of drilling a pilot hole and countersinking for a screw head, use tapered bits (AKA "Fuller bits"), not bits like these. I gave 'em away since I'd never use 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice quality apron that is very durable and will last ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at about the same time that I bought a new smartphone (I got Amazon's deal on the Nokia 6). My new phone is bigger than previous phones I've owned, and it fits really well in the phone pocket. This is huge for me in my shop because it prevents my phone from falling out if I bend to get something. Otherwise, this is a nice quality apron that is very durable and will last a long time. It is also really comfortable overall and has easy adjustments. I'm under 6' and about 150 lbs and it is not too big for me. Loved the packaging quality as well. Very professional and heavy duty!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great layout and material
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. Adjustable straps fit well and are padded. Comfortable on the shoulders even with full pockets and a 4lb forging hammer holstered. Purchased for a weekend workshop—was looking for something that matched the ergonomic layout of the aprons I'd used during rented shop time in Brooklyn. Waxed canvas is thick and a really nice material, should be more than enough protection to work material directly against the apron for leverage. Bottom pocket seams are reinforced with rivets and look like they can take a lot of abuse. Straps tighten easily and hold the apron close to the body for the entire length, important for safety to ensure that neither clothes or the apron can get pulled into nearby machinery.
customer_reviews.author: Edy Ny

customer_reviews.title: Budget tool - you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in quality control. The steel pieces that drill the recess for the screw head, in my set, do not tighten or stay tightened to the straight, drill bit. Thus, when you drill down to the wood surface, & begin to auger out that Recess, that extra auger part stops spinning due to friction. No more recess. I guess I’ll go back to the extra step of using a larger bit to burr out that recess.
customer_reviews.author: Old guy

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this thing
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my shop apron. I am in love with this thing. The fit is very good. The straps allow for plenty of adjustment and I love the fit. If I was going to may any improvement, I would have a simple way that the shoulder strap pads could be fixed/locked in place, just so they don't slide up/down. The pockets are great. Again, an improvement would be one pocket that could fit a speed square as that is such a common go to tool. I love the pocket flaps over some of the pockets (especially the pocket that can hold a phone). Well done. Very nice -- I only make suggestions on products I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a case that I wasn’t expecting. So I thought that was a nice surprise. Also came with a card from the manufacturer. The product was very heavy. I thought for the price it would have been cheaper quality but we used all the bits and they seem to work great. I am happy with my purchase. I can’t comment on longevity yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Dee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: These bits are useless. The bolt holding the countersink section to the drill bit will not hold. When you go to tighten it, the bolt is stripped very easily. These things are cheap and worthless. Don't bother wasting your time. I do wood work and they wouldn't work for soft southern pine.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R.

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable product
customer_reviews.text: Great, durable product. Easy to throw on and have chest through knee protection. Lots of useful pockets and straps to keep things organized and accesible. I’m thin and tall but the adjustable straps make this fit great and comfortably. Keeps from getting holes or messes on clothes when working with wood or metal in shop. Waxed cloth maxes for easy clean up as well.
customer_reviews.author: miked113

customer_reviews.title: Only one you will ever need or want!
customer_reviews.text: You can put this one on easily! Snap the buckle along the waist and you are ready to start working. A one time adjustment at the buckle, takes up the strap slack, so the top part of shop wear is correctly located covering your chest. The shoulder pads cab properly adjusted, are functional and not oversized. The best part of this sop wear besides built to last are the flaps covering the shop pockets - Keeps sawdust, etc out of the pockets, I may just wear this for rather simple projects in my garage - Makes you look like a professional woodworker...a psychological benefit ?
customer_reviews.author: OLarryR

customer_reviews.title: Machinist use. So far it's good.
customer_reviews.text: Week one under the belt. So far the apron has been very nice. The straps come super long. Just put it on and trim as needed. This thing is going to last a long while. The only downfall is the super flimsy strap keeper that sits on the back. The straps constantly twist in it. It will also work it's way up on the back of your neck if you move a lot. I will be making a better one to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: JDub

customer_reviews.title: Excellent locking collars, no stripping, so far.
customer_reviews.text: With any counter sink set you need be careful not to apply to much pressure on the bits themselves. I've had other bits that break with minimal pressure, but these have so far worked just fine. I prefer these locking collars over the black cheap sets so often supplied with other counter sink sets, they strip out and loose their hold rather quickly. So far, this set has been working out as expected. I've got a lot of work ahead for these bits and I expect they will continue to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ski

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money spent. Appear to be pretty well built although they all cut the countersinks larger than I would prefer and they need a good sharpening before use. Only time will tell concerning longevity but again, for the money you can afford to abuse them if the need arises. I was impressed with the quality of the drill bits as they cut good and are straight. After sharpening the countersinks I tried a few of them and was satisfied with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy counter sink bits
customer_reviews.text: You know the counter sink bits you can buy at your local home improvement store? These are NOT that. These bits are much more precise and sturdy for drilling perfect counter sink holes. The tapering on the counter sink help me not over cut the holes like some of the cheapy ones I've bought before. Good product, great price!
customer_reviews.author: DSP

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The bits are so poor in quality one of them bent! The stops don't stay in place after drilling just one hole, you need to tighten the nut each time. I do not recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Anne 944

customer_reviews.title: Great apron, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bicycle mechanic who often machines his own parts. Had to get a new apron after my old one (a black/gray Rhino-braded one from Amazon; also good quality) was appropriated by a cheeky apprentice in the shop. Overall, I really like this apron. Heavy canvas, good stitching & eyelets. I wish the lower front pockets were a little bigger, or that it had an additional hoodie-style pocket (which my Rhino apron had), but that's a minor gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Millions

customer_reviews.title: They make holes, until they break.
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok. The collar doesn't tighten very well to the bit. The bits break very easily. The pin to hold the collar in place strips out quickly, rendering the whole thing useless when the bit breaks. I got about 40-50 holes drilled before the first bit broke. I replaced with a better brand bit and got another 100 until the collar screw stripped out. Now i can't move or retighten the collar. 150 countersinks and i had to throw one away.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: I like the crossover in the back
customer_reviews.text: It appears heavy duty. I have only tried it on. It will be used in a forensic lab. It could use a hanger loop of some sort. Very hard to hang up. The straps are long enough - I have a 52" gut, 46" waist (classic beer belly). I like the crossover in the back. It really helps to reduce neck strain. It should give many years of service. I wish there was a tag indicating where this was made. I would prefer a product that was made here in America.
customer_reviews.author: Kip Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Well made brad point countersink bit set (7) with Allen wrench.
customer_reviews.text: I can start with a review on this review. The first question is Longevity. Difficult to answer as the items just arrived. Value for money and Durability, well that’s just Longevity again. So I give the review itself an F. The countersink bit set was purchased as a gift.$16.99 My buddy surprised me with an xacto pencil sharpener in the mail for Christmas, so I searched Amazon.com for tools under $20.00. The set is well made. Each counterbore is diameter matched and bit combination so no wobble. Brad point for accuracy. Set screw for depth stop. Sharp, strong. Precision made.counterboring sleeve will no doubt outlast bit, will work with other drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Roll

customer_reviews.title: Have yet to get one countersink to even come close to cutting with the bit.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't yet to get one countersink to even come close to cutting with the bit. Actually I quit trying. I'm not in any way shape or form ignorant in the use of the tool. Perhaps I received a dud. Don't know. Getting tired of the poor quality on Amazon everywhere though.
customer_reviews.author: expatASAP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start accurate pilot hole
customer_reviews.text: The bits have a centered fine point making it easy to start pilot hole exactly on line. Bits and the countersink cutters are sharp so leave no ragged edges even on soft wood. Depth of hole easily adjusted with included hex key. Was pleasantly surprised the entire kit is enclosed in a nice plastic case to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Christensen

customer_reviews.title: cheap amd functional but drill bits may not last
customer_reviews.text: used it for my woodworking hobby mostly on soft pine wood and occasionally 2x4s. after 6 months of light weekend use one of the small drill bits snapped off. not reassuring for its quality although i can probably use another generic bit with the collar.
customer_reviews.author: eid8801

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for fathers day. he had bought a different brand and it weighed on his neck. so far he has loved this apron. he likes that it doesn't weigh on his neck, he can put his lathe tools in the pouches so they are handy. He also has told me he likes the phone pocket and the flaps keep out sawdust. From what he has told me it sounds like he would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: garth davis

customer_reviews.title: Saddened by its durability, or lack there of.
customer_reviews.text: They feel durable enough but haven't gotten to utilize them just yet. Update : the smallest bit, which is perfect for standard wood screws has broken. Before that for the last 1.5weeks the Allen key won't tighten down enough to stay in place so it doesn't countersink anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph_AZ4eva

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty tightening. Hex key easily stripped after 1 day of use
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what good countersinks are like but I guess you get what you paid for here. The hex key bit are not durable at all. They dont fasten very tightly and within 1 day of use, it is completely stripped. My key bit on the first two, 3mm and 4mm countersinks, are completely stripped. So i took them from the larger pieces. Even then I still run into problems with tightening the countersinks to the drill bits. You can see from the video, the countersinks are not completely smooth. Maybe im doing it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Hoa V Phan

customer_reviews.title: They're working fine
customer_reviews.text: I needed some countersink bits so these looked like they'd do the job, so I bought them. And so far, I have no issues with them. They do what they're supposed to do, with no problems, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Purcella, That Kilted Guy DIY

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bits, very smooth operation.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used these extensively yet so can't comment on durability or longevity, but so far they seem great. Appear to be of good quality and have torn right through anything I've thrown at them. Makes nice smooth countersinks as well, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy canvas. Love the phone pocket, it holds my iPhone 6S Plus and taking it out of the holder is fast and easy. It was a chore to get the straps sized for me... the ties are exceptionally long. I folded the excess and rubber banded it to keep it out of the way. If you get the waist sized properly pulling down hard on apron to simulate heavy tools... does not
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Pockets with flaps
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in my fine working class, and have not had squares wearing through the pockets. I really like the pocket flaps, they really cut down on saw dust. This is a item that will wear out at some point, but has out lasted my old Bucket Boss apron. The Aspen Workwear is a simple design and not over engineered with useless pockets that wear out, and this is why I only gave a 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Elkins

customer_reviews.title: The bits do not work well
customer_reviews.text: The first and second bit from small one to larger one somehow cuts the wood, but not like new drill bits. The third bit and bits after that do not cut the wood at all. The counter sink part for all bits works good but it was better to have two Allen screws instead of one, because one screw hardly holds the counter sink connected to the drill bit. I fasten Allen screw a few times to secure the counter sink part to the bit .The Allen wrench provided was a little small in dimeter so when pushing hard it starts spinning so I have no choice but using my own Allen wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Move on to some other pry
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Drill bits are nice but the countersuit will not stay on. The set screw will not hold it in place
customer_reviews.author: F. D. Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Hex screw is poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Drills really well. However, the hex screw that secures countersink bit is poor quality. If you need to change the bit depth, the hex rounded off. I even used a very good quality hex driver to ensure a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard D. H

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Quality’s
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machining true to size, the counter bore is five cutter. The case was a bonus! Excellent product. Get them. Order was quickly fulfilled. Overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Bit arrived bent, and set screws stripped. Sealed package.
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening, the smallest bit was bent. I tried using the countersink with one of my own bits, but the set screw stripped. These bits are trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Either poor quality or received a faulty bit
customer_reviews.text: One of the two bits I used on some 2x4s broke on the first use. Worked great for about 5 holes before the bit broke off from the countersink top section.
customer_reviews.author: tjd

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set with multiple sizes, packaged well and received fast! I have only used one of them so far and it worked great. Can't comment on longevity, but appears to be well made and I have no durability doubts.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin b Berger

customer_reviews.title: Countersink bits - you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Odd that reviews and ratings for shop aprons are conflated. The countersink bits are poorly made. The countersink cutter won’t stay in place. Tightening sufficiently strips the set screw. I needed to complete my project so got a set of Bosch bits at the hardware store. Quite a bit more expensive but they work perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I'm changing my review. I used one of the bits for the second time - literally the second hole ever drilled. It snapped under the slightest tension. Do yourself a favor and pay for a better countersink bit.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: SWEET!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new Aspen Workwear apron. I was a bit concerned about this fitting me. I am fatter than XXL. I took the gamble and am VERY happy to report that it fits me perfectly. I am really going to enjoy wearing this high quality, very well made work apron. Thanks Aspen Workwear!
customer_reviews.author: Gern F. Nortner

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Given the price point I have to say I did not have very high expectations. I was very impressed with the quality when they arrived. I highly recommend this countersink drill bit set.
customer_reviews.author: 3whelr

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality
customer_reviews.text: We started using these in our metal shop about a year ago and couldn't be happier with them. We abuse these with grinding debris, wire brushes, welding spatter, slag, etc. and they still don't have a single tear or hole! Buy it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive set.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure of the longevity of this set, and the machining seems crude but they are cheaper. My concern is the blunt ends for centering, wish they had a greater taper.
customer_reviews.author: Indy W.

customer_reviews.title: Comparing it to craftsmen’s
customer_reviews.text: Just completed some testing and it is sturdy then the craftsmen set i bought at Lowes that costed more As far as Now long it will last i am unsure i promise to update if something fishy comes up
customer_reviews.author: John A. Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Handyman friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for that handy man in your life or in our case our handy neighbor that offered to fix everything but doesn’t always have the right tool.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Just received them and have tried on some scrap wood and they work perfectly. Really like the case they came in also.
customer_reviews.author: NO SPIN

customer_reviews.title: Countersink Drill Bit (7 PCS), Drill Bit Set with One Hex Key
customer_reviews.text: Tried using the Countersink Drill Bits but they didn't work well at all. As soon as the countersink part hit the wood they would just spend . It didn't mater how much they was tighten they just didn't work. After I striped one of the Allen sewers by trying to tighten it I stop trying.
customer_reviews.author: Don B.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed in my shop.
customer_reviews.text: A quality product that is easy to put on and off and covers me well for working in my shop. Haven't used all of the pockets but know they are there if needed. Primary reason for buying this particular item though was that it fits well and there is no strap around my neck like others I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. F. Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Fits a bigger person easily and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I work with metal and wanted an apron that was more durable. I have worn my new apron a handful of times and find it to be very comfortable and durable. I am 5’3” and a bigger person and it fits really well all the way around. I can stick a towel through the sidebar loop and carry my phone in the top pocket very easily. I have a 6+ Iphone. I also love the padding on the shoulders and the clip in the back for easy closure and opening. I would recommend that Aspen Workwear provided the measurements of the apron in their description. I had to take a guess that it would fit me and luckily it did.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shop apron
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality and durable shop apron that fit my needs perfectly. It has lots of pockets and is easy to adjust for the exact fit you need.
customer_reviews.author: BobR

customer_reviews.title: One size fits all
customer_reviews.text: JaNene Bought this apron a week ago. When it came I was impressed with the fit. I am larger that my husband but with the adjustable straps it fits both of us really well. The material looks like it will hold up well, my husband is framing a basement and it was real easy to work with, had a place for everything. (wish the hammer loop was a little bigger) for a framing hammer. I believe that we will get years of wear out of this apron. I am happy with it and would recommend it to anyone looking for a work apron.
customer_reviews.author: ljk

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the DIY selfer needed.
customer_reviews.text: I immediately opened up the set and used it. It actually worked better than I thought it would. Made making my picnic bench a breeze! I recommend these bits to anyone! Chance Gober
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Chance Gober

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits are useless. I had to throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: niknikmontana

customer_reviews.title: Get What You Pay For (i.e. cheap)
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used lots of countersinks over the years. It’s one of those products that you truly get what you pay for. The main problem here is that the countersink does not stay fastened to the drill bit. Which, at the end of the day, is what makes this product useful. The maker needs to perform better machining on the parts.
customer_reviews.author: sarno

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for fair price
customer_reviews.text: I just received this set yesterday and my impression upon first inspection is that the quality is good. Based on that I'll assume the durability and longevity match up but I guess time will tell. I thought the price was very good for the apparent quality. I looked up the manufacturer online and they make other quality products across several industries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can be better
customer_reviews.text: They drill well however the stopper nut keeps slipping no matter how hard I tighten it. Actually the included Allen Key got broken when I was tightening.
customer_reviews.author: Thamer Elhomsy

customer_reviews.title: Dull and bent
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk, best just to buy a good set. All the small bits are bent, and dull
customer_reviews.author: To Connect 2000s

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully you have better luck than me
customer_reviews.text: Love the set but the set screw on a few of the bits aren’t holding very well. I’m not sure I’d buy this set again
customer_reviews.author: TheDiyGuyExtreme

customer_reviews.title: Counter bits
customer_reviews.text: I’m using these bits on wood. I used to counter sink using two bits, not anymore! These bits are making my life easier. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Timedilation

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Does precisely what it looks like it would do. I use these quite often for nearly every woodworking project.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and accessible to carry around drill bit screws
customer_reviews.text: Everything came so quick and well wrapped. I love that it came in a case to keep all the screws in place. Each one fit perfect on our drill. Was very easy to access and accessible. My husband loves it. heavy duty items. cute little box to keep all the screws in.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalVlogs

customer_reviews.title: Low quality and doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: The countersink part slips out and the bit is extremely fragile, terrible product... Just get the Dewalt one...
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for multi tool projects and keeping my shirts clean.
customer_reviews.text: This Apron is great for working in my shop. I mostly use on random projects in shop, around the house and occasionally when working on my motocross bikes. Nice pocket for phone so I can finally stop dropping it. I wear xl and xxl size shirts but my wife put on the other day and it tightened down to fit her as well. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he was thrilled! He said they fit his electric screwdriver perfectly and do an amazing job. They feel very solid and great quality - overall we are very happy with this item!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: 6 of the 7 countersink drill bit are so untrue they are not safe to use. The 8mm was straight enough to try out, but so dull it left a ragged edge on the hole. I called the number on the back of the card that arrived with the product. Suprise, no answer. This is the first Amazon purchase I have ever written a bad review of. It deserves zero (or less) starts
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good looks but bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product looks good but the box arrived completely broken
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This product earns a 0 if the truth were told. 4 of the 7 set screws were stripped out.
customer_reviews.author: Fjon

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before the date quoted, heavy duty and made very well. Already used it for several days and it is exactly what I was expecting. I appreciate the follow up from Aspen Wear assuring my satisfaction but not bugging me with to many e-mails.
customer_reviews.author: Russ T.

customer_reviews.title: Great bits but make sure you want the sizes
customer_reviews.text: They were a little bigger then I thought, but that was on me. They work great and they will last me a long time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gent

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: High production capabilities. Good quality. Ill get years of use from this drill bit/countersink set.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Should have spent the money on a decent set
customer_reviews.text: These are a "you get what you pay for" kind of item. They work ok but the set screw slips and is hard to tighten down. One of mine is stuck and the set screw has stripped out. I'll keep using them for now but will want to upgrade if i end up needing them more often.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Bits aren't even straight and the base is so small the chuck can't grip very well
customer_reviews.author: PassionateReviewer

customer_reviews.title: The quality is second to none.
customer_reviews.text: This apron is incredible. The fit is perfect with just the right amount of pockets for my wood carving. The quality is second to none. The people making this apron are indeed craftsman. I will definitely be buying more of your products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Stewart

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT FOR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: used them once so can't comment on longevity yet. seem durable and am pleased with purchase. good product.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Belden

customer_reviews.title: Work good, nice case to keep them all together
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different sizes and very adjustable. well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: John Hess

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, sharp and durable. Package delivered by UPS looked like someone stomped in it but items remained intact.
customer_reviews.author: christy d.

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: The smallest one broke with in the first use and this is not very durable if you ask me!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rudman

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these a couple of times so far and they worked out well. Sharp, came very fast and look to be very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: William Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Great tools and a pleasure to use Good sale Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Bob B

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I'd hoped it would do, and more!
customer_reviews.text: Not only a good countersink option, but by flipping it over, these act quite well as depth collars.
customer_reviews.author: Mikado58

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile investment
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged so as not to damage the bits. These bits are very sharp and true to measure. A worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Elza

customer_reviews.title: Tried out one also
customer_reviews.text: I tried out the second to the smallest one and it worked well. I am using it in a drill press. The countersink came lose several times in the 20 plus holes I did. Seems to do a great job. It is too soon to rate the durability and longevity. They seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product!!! Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Woodworking, remodeling home, quality product , same day delivery arrived mid day. I will definitely be using you again, also appreciate the case that the bits came in, the reason I was unable to assign a star ratting to longevity ,haven’t had them long to .
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shop apron for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shop apron for the price. The stitching isn't the cleanest but it is definitely strong and the canvas is good quality. The piece that crosses the straps holds them together in the back is far too thin and just rolls on itself. The clasps that link the straps together also is of a poor quality and slide loose frequently.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Well made and extremely comfortable. I work in a restaurant and wear it all day without any discomfort. The pockets are great and the price is amazing for such a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: romero

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my father, he fixed floor . He said this is good quality workhorse apron, comfortable to move around in and easy adjustment. Packaging quality is good too, it is value for money.
customer_reviews.author: luckyyan168

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: As pointed out by others, the collar screws are horrible to use. They need to be re-tighten constantly and in a very short time they strip out. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JGS

customer_reviews.title: Definite value
customer_reviews.text: Compare the cost to other brands and these are very reasonable. My first use was a success, but i just received and used one size, so it is hard to comment on durability and longevity. They look and feel well made though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier. Great product, great price. I love the smooth countersink they develop.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Buch

customer_reviews.title: Great apron, adjustable - very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great apron. Fits my iphone 6 plus, pencils, various tools, wrenches, etc. needed while working. Nice and heavy duty, easy adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great service. It arrived on time. Quality tools at a great price. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: I like the Brad point aspect. the case will last a little while which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Not worth spending money on. I do not know if I would use them even if they were given to me.
customer_reviews.author: Fxg10

customer_reviews.title: Locking  mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Drill bits and sink work well. My dislike is that it doesn’t always lock with the tool they gave/easily looses around bit. When it works (which is most of the time) it works well
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Nice range of sizes
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but it seems to be good quality. It does come in a reusable storage case.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse S

customer_reviews.title: Make good product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this product it’s very poor in work when I start drilling on hard board drill bet bend instantly
customer_reviews.author: ghanshyam patel

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great drill bits, great value! I'd have been satisfied with my purchase even if they were twice the price. If you're shopping around, these are definitely worth checking out. Arrived well packaged. Will buy these when I need more bits.
customer_reviews.author: Harold J. Bressler

customer_reviews.title: Great for the woodworker!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. I love to make sawdust in my workshop and having a work apron that is durable and comfortable is important. Most of all, I love all of the pockets on the front AND the fact that they are covered as to not fill up with sawdust.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ahle

product_meta.title: Werkzeug Countersink Drill Bits Set- 7Pcs Counter Sink Bit for Wood High Speed Steel, Woodworking Carpentry Reamer With 1 Free Hex Key Wrench (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverWerkzeug Countersink Drill Bit -- Good helper for wood DIY. Idea for Granite, tile, quartize, ceramic, vitrified brick etc

Specifications
Material : high carbon steel
Size : 3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 6mm, 7mm, 8mm, 10mm
Quantity : 1Set ( 1Hex-Key, 7Drills)
Suitable kit : Bench drill
Suitable material : Granite, tile, quartize, ceramic, vitrified brick etc
Don’t fit : Metal, concrete, glass, plasterboard, steel plate, iron plate

How to Use Countersink Drill Bit?
Step 1. Attach a countersink drill bit to your power bench or hand drill.
Step 2. Keep drill vertical 90°, get a smooth surface hole.
Step 3. Screw cap perfect embedded in the surface of workpiece.

Special Notice
1. Must keep the drill vertical completely while drilling ! Otherwise, it will be easy to break the bit.
2. When a drill bit is damaged, just need to replace the counterbore device that can continue to use.
3. Suggest to use a bench drill, the effect will be better than a hand electric drill that is not fixed in the operation process, the drill bit is prone to bend and break!

Package Included
1*Werkzeug L- Wrench
7*Werkzeug Countersink Drill Bit (3mm,4mm,5mm,6mm,7mm,8mm, 10mm)
feature_bullets: 【High Carbon Steel 】 Werkzeug countersink drill bits are made of high carbon steel. Which offer superior cutting power. High hardness and wear resistance, convenient and fast to drill a hole

【Hex-Key 】 Countersink drill set is contains 1 piece of hex key and 7 different sizes of countersink drill bit. Use the hex key to remove five-bevel chamfer or adjust counter sleeve depth and drilling depth for screws of various lengths. Complete specifications can satisfy all you demand
【Three-Pointed Design 】 Three-Pointed design can quickly and accurately drill a hole. Edge sharpness and smooth drilling

【Five-edged Chamfer 】 Spiral fluted will fast discharge chips from the hole on both sides automatically. It can effectively prevent the accumulation of debris retention, improve the drilling efficiency
【Superior Service 】 If you have any questions or concerns about our product, please do not hesitate to contact us, we always here to service you
